body.name: INPHIC Mouse, 3 Modes Bluetooth 5.0&4.0 Mouse 2.4G Rechargeable Wireless Mouse with 6 Buttons, Ergonomic Computer Mouse for Laptop, Mac, PC etc.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 50 mins
features: ✔ 【BATTERY POWER DISPLAY AT A GLANCE】Upgraded visible battery indicator on the top of the mouse design, at a glance, you'll know the remaining battery, as well as an indication of when it's time to recharge. Say goodbye to power outage anxiety and give you a sense of security

✔ Silent Click(left and right button): Silent clicking laptop mouse for left and right button fits the circumstance for using the mouse in public, such as library, dormitory, office and so on, and apart from blue light indication during recharging and light off after full recharge, this design results worry-free for disturbing others

✔ Ergonomic Design: The Bluetooth Mouse Is Designed For Right-Handed User For The Best Hand Feeling. Six Efficient Buttons And Three Adjustable Dpi Level (1000/1200/1600) That Allow You To Freely Control The Mouse Speed.

✔Tri-Mode Connection: Inphic Bluetooth 5.0/4.0 And 2.4g Usb Connection. You Can Switch To Any Mode By Clicking The Mode Switch Button Located At The Bottom Of The Mouse. The Indication Lights Of Bluetooth 5.0, Bluetooth 4.0 And 2.4g Usb Are Green, Blue And Red, Respectively. Once You Complete The Pair Of Bluetooth Or Insert The Usb, You Can Freely Switch To Each Mode And The Maximum Operating Distance Of Each Mode Is 10 Meters.

✔ 1-Year Warranty: 45-Day Unconditional Refund And 12 Months Repairing Warranty. It Is Compatible With Windows 7/8/10/Xp, Vista And Mac Os System. Meanwhile, The Bluetooth 5.0 Is Compatible With Windows 8/10(But Not Windows 7 Or Xp), Android, Mac Os System; 2.4g Usb Connected Mode Support Any Usb Enabled Devices, Which Just Need To Simply Insert The Usb Receiver. P.S. Bluetooth 5.0 Supports Ios System For Both Ipad And Iphone, But The Ios System Has To Be Ios 14 Or Later Version.

Trend Science and Technology Research Institute Inphic is simplified from in (cool), professional (professional), and high-tech (high-tech), and is committed to providing young people with cool and professional high-tech products. We want products that are not just purely functional but also have good design. So here comes the inphic. Target We are committed to becoming a recognized world-class intelligent hardware company, with the corporate mission of "improving people's entertainment level, reducing people's entertainment costs, and bringing the joy of technological progress to as many people as possible!"

System Requirement 2.4G wireless mode: Win XP / WIN7 / WIN8 / WIN10 or laterBluetooth 4.0 mode: Win XP / WIN7 / WIN8 / WIN10, Mac, Chrome OS, Android SystemBluetooth 5.0 mode: WIN8 / WIN10, Mac, Chrome OS, Android system (Bluetooth 5.0 does not support Win 7/ XP)Note: IOS (iPad/iPhone) is supported, but must be IOS 10.3 or above system. How to connect to Bluetooth mode? Turn on the power switch to Bluetooth modeBluetooth 5.0 mode: (green light flashes slowly); Bluetooth 4.0 mode:(blue light flashes slowly)Press the Bluetooth pairing button for about three seconds, the power indicator flashes (Bluetooth 5.0: Green; Bluetooth 4.0: Blue), indicate that the mouse is in pairing mode.Search for "BT5.0 Mouse_Pro" or "BT4.0 Mouse" through your devices, and then click to match. The indicator light will go out after pairing and the mouse can be used normally.

DURABLE CLICKS Real 3 million times keystroke Test and perform well. It's ideal for work or entertainment in the home and office EASY CHARGING Built-in high-capacity 700mah battery, providing long-term and abundant battery life (Charge via the computer is highly suggested for better battery life) SMART POWER SAVING The laptop mouse automatically goes into sleep mode after 5 minutes of inactivity to conserve power and can be activated again by gently moving it

CHANGE SPEED ON DEMAND Support stable connection and precise track with a working distance of up to 10 meters. 3 DPI switches (1000, 1200, 1600) change the speed of the mouse freely BETTER SUPPORT FOR HANDS Ergonomic design with wider finger support, better protect your palm, fingers and wrist from long time working MULTI-FUNCTION WIRELESS MOUSE Featuring a 6-button design, You’ll quickly switch from page to page on the web in an instant and save time with the Forward/Backward buttons of this pc mouse

reviews.reviewerName: well-read and still learningwell-read and still learning
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best budget mice I've ever tried
reviews.reviewText: By just about every metric you would use to define a mouse by, this one checks off just about every box. - Ergonomic/comfort - check - it has a sweet spot for size and comfort that rivals more expensive mice. One nit that might affect you depending on the size of your hands is the back button on the side. It was perfect for me, but for bigger hands it might get hit accidentally. - DPI/movement - check - up to 1600 DPI will make just about any creator/gamer happy - Connectivity - check (sorta) - with 2.5 MHz and two Bluetooth options, it's pretty solid and connects every time I've tried, on 2.5 and Bluetooth 5 (haven't tried Bluetooth 4 yet) - Battery life - check-a-roo-check - it's got a rechargeable USB-C port, with battery indicator on top, which is pretty much unheard of in this price category. - build quality is solid and much better than I expected. The mouse-clicks are near silent, which freaked out my gamer son who expected to hear an audible "click". Ultimately he concluded he liked the mouse, just wasn't used to any mouse being so quiet.I've been using this non-stop for the last couple of days and I like it a lot. I bought it as a temporary mouse to replace a Razer Basilisk X Hyperspeed that died on me (and remarkably started working AFTER I bought and received this one).You can see from the comparison pics how similar the size is. For me, this mouse fits better in my hand than the Basilisk. t's not a direct replacement for a mouse like the Basilisk, but for the money it's pretty close. It lacks in one thing most hardcore gamers really need - a decent polling rate. While most gaming mice nowadays poll near 1000, like the Basilisk, this one never got higher than 140.But seriously, unless you're a competitive gamer, you won't notice this. For under $20 US with coupon, you cannot beat this deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mouse, smooth performance.
reviews.reviewText: I've bought a fair amount of mice to use with my laptop. All of them had issues at some point. Either was a bad inconsistent connectivity, or poor battery life.Not this one. So far 6 months later after I purchased it, it keeps working flawlessly. I can list the things I like the most about it:- Really comfortable and ergonomic. Your hand and fingers rest on it in a comfortable natural way.- Buttons are fast and responsive. So far the buttons still work as intended and have not worn out.-Rechargeable battery. Not only I dont have to replace the battery every few weeks like others. This mouse comes with its own rechargeable battery and using it daily at work, Ive only needed to charge it twice a week and when I do, the battery still shows about 70% charge, so the battery life is amazing and performs beyond my expectations.-Connectivity has been flawless, consistent and fast. I have never had any problems like other mice in which the connection would be lost, or it would take a lot of time for the mice to be discovered. The mouse is ready as soon as the computer boots and loads the operating system.I couldn't recommend this mouse more. Go for it. totally worth it. Excellent mouse

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Actual Bluetooth mouse without the need of a small adapter.
reviews.reviewText: This exceptional wireless mouse offers a range of features that combine to provide a versatile, convenient, and comfortable computing experience across various devices.The standout feature of the INPHIC Bluetooth Mouse is its compatibility across three different modes: Bluetooth 5.0, Bluetooth 4.0, and 2.4G wireless. This impressive versatility ensures that the mouse can seamlessly connect to a wide range of devices, from laptops and computers to Macs and PCs. This adaptability is a true game-changer for those who work across multiple devices or prefer using different connectivity methods.The inclusion of six buttons adds to the mouse's functionality and convenience. These buttons are strategically placed to enhance your productivity and streamline tasks such as scrolling, navigating, and switching between applications. The layout is intuitive and user-friendly, allowing you to customize the mouse's behavior to suit your workflow.The ergonomic design of the INPHIC Bluetooth Mouse prioritizes comfort during extended usage. The shape is well-suited for both left- and right-handed users, ensuring that anyone can enjoy a comfortable and fatigue-free experience. The mouse's design promotes a natural hand position, reducing strain and enhancing your overall computing comfort.The rechargeable feature is an essential aspect that reduces the need for frequent battery replacements. The mouse's long-lasting battery life ensures that you can use it for extended periods without worrying about running out of power. When it does need recharging, the process is simple and hassle-free, further contributing to the overall convenience of the INPHIC Bluetooth Mouse.The precision and responsiveness of the mouse's tracking ensure smooth and accurate cursor movement. This level of accuracy is essential for tasks that demand attention to detail, such as design work, gaming, or data entry. The mouse's performance speaks to its high-quality construction and design.The compact and sleek design of the INPHIC Bluetooth Mouse makes it ideal for both on-the-go use and office setups. The minimalist appearance adds a touch of sophistication to your workspace, while the mouse's portability ensures that you can take it with you wherever you go.In terms of connectivity, the Bluetooth 5.0 and 4.0 options provide seamless and stable connections, reducing the chances of interruptions or lag. The 2.4G wireless option offers an alternative for those who prefer traditional connectivity methods.In conclusion, the INPHIC Bluetooth Mouse offers a superior computing experience with its versatile connectivity, multiple buttons, ergonomic design, rechargeable feature, and precision tracking. Whether you're using a laptop, computer, Mac, or PC, this mouse excels in performance and comfort. With the INPHIC Bluetooth Mouse, you can elevate your computing experience and enjoy a reliable and user-friendly tool that enhances your productivity and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the money
reviews.reviewText: Have only had this mouse a couple of days so cannot speak to battery life as of yet. I can say it is very quiet and feels good in the hand. I use it via the bluetooth which I love. While it is pretty responsive it is not for the hardcore gamer. It just doesn't have that kind of responsiveness. It is great for normal users or even casual gamers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and High Performance Ergonomic Delight
reviews.reviewText: This is a full sized standard mouse. It is an ergonomic delight. My hand rests comfortably on the necessary switches and allows my arthritic thumb and fingers a very restful position. No longer do I suffer cramps and stabbing pains just to click or move the mouse.I use it with my micro computer in BT 5.0 mode and it performs spot on in in standard and gaming modes. As a 35 year veteran with major computer manufactures, I can state this is a superb piece of tech at a reasonable price. It looks great also!

reviews.reviewTitle: look no further for your next mouse
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired this gaming mouse, and it has truly transformed my gaming experience. From its comfortable and ergonomic design to its outstanding performance, every aspect of this mouse exudes excellence.The mouse's ergonomic design immediately caught my attention. It fits seamlessly in my hand, providing a comfortable grip during prolonged gaming sessions. The absence of RGB lighting gives it a sleek and minimalist look, which I personally appreciate for its understated elegance.However, the standout feature is the precision this mouse offers. The responsive sensor ensures pinpoint accuracy, and the adjustable DPI settings allow me to effortlessly adapt to various gaming scenarios. Whether I'm engaging in long-range sniping or fast-paced close-quarters combat, this mouse keeps up with my every move.The programmable buttons have proven to be invaluable. Customizing commands to these buttons has significantly enhanced my gameplay, offering a competitive edge. The tactile feedback from the buttons is satisfying, and the click response is impressively swift.Durability is another key highlight. The construction feels sturdy, and the high-quality materials assure me that this gaming mouse can endure the demands of intense gaming sessions. The braided cable adds an extra layer of durability and reduces the risk of tangling.Setting up the mouse was a breeze, thanks to the user-friendly software that accompanied it. The intuitive interface allowed me to fine-tune settings, create macros, and update firmware effortlessly.In terms of value for money, this gaming mouse competes with models that are significantly more expensive, offering comparable performance and features. It's proof that you don't need to overspend to get a top-tier gaming accessory.In conclusion, I am thoroughly satisfied with my purchase. This gaming mouse has seamlessly integrated into my gaming rig, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to fellow gamers. If you're searching for a high-performance, customizable, and durable gaming mouse without the flashy RGB lights, look no further. This product has earned its five-star rating, and I couldn't be more pleased with my investment.
Funciona muy bien y es ergonomico, muy buena calidad.

reviews.reviewTitle: melhor mouse que tive até agora
reviews.reviewText: Ainda não consegui ativar o "Tri-Mode" disponível conforme a descrição do produto, mas, por não ser necessidade até o momento, não insisti muito nisso. No que preciso, ele tem me servido muito bem. Confortável de usar, design que encaixa bem na mão (gosto de mouse grande), tem as opções de botões laterais para avançar e retroceder muito úteis em navegações entre páginas e pastas. O clique dos botões e o Scroll Wheel (botão do meio) são super macios e silenciosos (exceto os laterais citados antes). Mas o destaque positivo para esse mouse é a bateria. Deixei carregando cerca de uma hora no primeiro dia e estou usando há 15 dias e ainda não há sinais de bateria fraca. Ele desativa automaticamente depois de um tempo de inatividade o que é ótimo para economizar bateria. O único ponto "negativo" é que sou acostumado com a luz vermelha em baixo do mouse e ele é totalmente apagado, mesmo ligado e funcionando, ainda não acostumei com isso rs. Em resumo, super satisfeito com o produto. Vale a pena!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Fijne muis voor een mooie prijs
reviews.reviewText: Deze muis doet niet veel onder voor duurdere muizen zoals de Logitech Signature M650 L waar ik ook mee werk. De Logitech vult mn handpalm wel iets beter maar voor deze prijs mag je niet klagen. De muis is nauwkeurig en het klikken is geruisloos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does what it nerds to do!
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly on my Windows and Mac device
